{{salePercentage}}% OFF Everything!

{{promoCode}}

Suits, shirts, accessories

👗 Women's Fashion

Dresses, shoes, handbags

  • {{salePercentage}}% off sitewide - no minimum purchase
  • Free shipping on orders over ${{freeShippingThreshold}}

  • New arrivals included in sale
Shop Now & Save

Don't let this amazing deal slip away!

Happy shopping,
The {{organizationName}} Team

fields.name: Order Confirmation
fields.subject: Order Confirmation #{{orderNumber}} - Thank You!
fields.html_content:
✅ Order Confirmed!

Thank you for shopping with us

Hi {{firstName}},

Thank you for your order! We've received your purchase and are preparing it for shipment.

📦 Order Summary

Order Number: #{{orderNumber}}

Order Date: {{orderDate}}

Total Amount: ${{orderTotal}}

Payment Method: {{paymentMethod}}

🚚 Shipping Information

Shipping Address:

{{shippingAddress}}
{{shippingCity}}, {{shippingState}} {{shippingZip}}

Estimated Delivery: {{estimatedDelivery}}

Tracking Number: {{trackingNumber}} (available when shipped)

📋 What's Next?

  • We'll send you a shipping confirmation with tracking details
  • Your order will be processed within 1-2 business days
  • Contact us if you need to make changes (within 1 hour)
Track Your Order Customer Support

We appreciate your business and can't wait for you to receive your order!

Happy shopping,
The {{organizationName}} Team

fields.name: Assignment Due Reminder
fields.subject: Reminder: {{assignmentName}} Due {{dueDate}}
fields.html_content:
⏰ Assignment Reminder

Don't miss your deadline

Hi {{firstName}},

This is a friendly reminder that your assignment "{{assignmentName}}" is due soon.

📅 Due Date

{{dueDate}} at {{dueTime}}

📋 Assignment Details:

Course: {{courseName}}

Assignment: {{assignmentName}}

Points: {{totalPoints}} points

Submission Type: {{submissionType}}

📝 Quick Tips:

  • Review the assignment rubric
  • Check your work before submitting
  • Submit early to avoid technical issues
  • Contact your instructor if you have questions
Submit Assignment Need Help?

This is an automated reminder. If you've already submitted your assignment, please disregard this message.

Good luck with your assignment!
The {{organizationName}} Team

fields.name: Course Enrollment Confirmation
fields.subject: Welcome to {{courseName}} - Enrollment Confirmed
fields.html_content:
🎓 Enrollment Confirmed!

Welcome to your learning journey

Hi {{firstName}},

Congratulations! You've successfully enrolled in {{courseName}}. We're excited to support your learning journey.

📚 Course Details:

Course: {{courseName}}

Instructor: {{instructorName}}

Start Date: {{startDate}}

Duration: {{courseDuration}}

Schedule: {{classSchedule}}

🚀 Getting Started:

  • Access your course materials online
  • Join the class discussion forum
  • Download required reading materials
  • Set up your study schedule

💻 Technical Requirements:

Make sure you have reliable internet access and the latest version of your web browser for the best learning experience.

Access Course Get Support

We're here to help you succeed. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out!

Best of luck with your studies,
The {{organizationName}} Team

fields.html_content:
📊 Financial Statement Available

{{organizationName}}

Dear {{firstName}},

Your {{statementType}} statement for the period ending {{periodEnd}} is now available for review.

Statement Summary:

Account Number: {{accountNumber}}

Statement Period: {{statementPeriod}}

Statement Type: {{statementType}}

Important Notes:

  • Review all transactions carefully
  • Report any discrepancies within 30 days
  • Keep statements for your records
Download Statement

For questions about your statement, please contact us at {{supportPhone}} or visit {{websiteUrl}}.

Sincerely,
{{organizationName}} Customer Service

fields.name: Healthcare Wellness Newsletter
fields.subject: Your Monthly Wellness Update from {{organizationName}}
fields.html_content:
💚 Wellness Update

Your health journey matters to us

Hi {{firstName}},

Welcome to your monthly wellness update! Here are some health tips and updates from our team.

🍎 This Month's Health Tip

Stay hydrated! Aim for 8 glasses of water daily to support optimal body function and maintain energy levels throughout the day.

📅 Upcoming Health Screenings

  • Annual physical exams - Schedule now
  • Flu vaccinations available
  • Blood pressure checks - Walk-ins welcome

🏃‍♀️ Wellness Challenge

Join our "10,000 Steps Challenge" this month! Track your daily steps and win prizes for reaching your goals.

Access Health Portal

Stay healthy and take care,
The {{organizationName}} Team
